allow:
Bash(python3 -c "
import json
with open\(''geoBoundaries-JPN-ADM2_simplified.geojson'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)
    
targets = [''美里'', ''東秩父'', ''小山'']
for feature in data[''features'']:
    name = feature[''properties''].get\(''shapeName'', ''''\)
    if any\(target in name for target in targets\):
        print\(f""Found: {name} \(ISO: {feature[''properties''].get\(''shapeISO'', ''N/A''\)}\)""\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import json
with open\(''geoBoundaries-JPN-ADM2_simplified.geojson'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)
    
targets = [''美里'', ''東秩父'', ''小山'']
for feature in data[''features'']:
    name = feature[''properties''].get\(''shapeName''\)
    if name and any\(target in name for target in targets\):
        print\(f""Found: {name} \(ISO: {feature[''properties''].get\(''shapeISO'', ''N/A''\)}\)""\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import json
with open\(''geoBoundaries-JPN-ADM2_simplified.geojson'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)
    print\(''Total features:'', len\(data[''features'']\)\)
    print\(''First feature properties:''\)
    print\(json.dumps\(data[''features''][0][''properties''], indent=2, ensure_ascii=False\)\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import json
with open\(''geoBoundaries-JPN-ADM2_simplified.geojson'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)
    
targets_en = [''Misato'', ''Higashichichibu'', ''Oyama'']
for feature in data[''features'']:
    name = feature[''properties''].get\(''shapeName'', ''''\)
    if any\(target.lower\(\) in name.lower\(\) for target in targets_en\):
        print\(f""Found: {name} \(ISO: {feature[''properties''].get\(''shapeISO'', ''N/A''\)}\)""\)
")
